structure.unit: Motorboats, Other Vessels And Recreational Vehicles

law.catch_line: Summons For Violation Of Secs. 26 A Or 26 B
law.text: A summons may be issued instead of a warrant for arrest upon a complaint for a violation of section 26A or 26B if in the judgment of the court or justice receiving the complaint there is reason to believe that the defendant will appear upon a summons. Nothing in this section shall limit a law enforcement officerâ€™s power to arrest under any other provisions of the General Laws or at common law.
